actions.text: Amendment SA 5418 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 306.
Amendment SA 5418 proposed by Senator Shelby to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4186; text: CR S4186) To end the President's War on Coal through the approval of coal leases.
